entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
